title: Developer Encounter
content: This is the first Encounter in the list and we use it to mess around.

title: Graveyard Fashion Advice (1)
content: You see a nearby patch of dirt rumble... and out pops a skeleton with round, purple frames. She rattles and gives some advice, "You would look really good wearing orange at the Sternum Ball."

actionList.label: Oh no, she needs help getting back in her grave!

title: Graveyard Fashion Advice (2)
content: She giggles really excitedly and it makes a rattle so joyful that you giggle, too! You both giggle until you have to wipe the tears from your face.

title: Graveyard Fashion Advice (3)
content: You caress her and slowly help her lay back on her dirt bed. All while she's telling how cute you look and that orange really would suit you. I bet you're totally blushing.

title: The Darkness Meows
content: Oh no.. it can't be... it couldn't... not now...! A black cat with sparkling blue eyes crosses your path on the worse night imaginable! Fate has it in for you... You feel so unlucky.

title: Blessed by the Fairy
content: You see a little glowing thing pass by in front of you. Upon closer inspection, its a fairy who's carrying a piece of candy about her size! She sees you and gives it to you and says "I really like your costume!"

title: Free Naffy Taffy?
content: "Hey, I'm not a big fan of Naffy Taffy so you can have it."

title: Friendly House (at the door)
content: You come up to a nicely decorated house. There's bunch of candy corn lights leading up to the front porch, where some crudely carved jack-o-lanterns smile at you. It's a house you've been to many times before and you know they always have full-size candy bars!

title: Friendly House (treat)
content:
You ring the doorbell and are greeted by your cheerful neighbor wearing a giant sponge outfit!

"Nya ha ha! How ya doing? Here's some candy fella!"

title: Friendly House (trick)
content:
You Trick the house into opening up and spook the friendly neighbor! He spills a bunch of candy - and you greedily snatch a bunch of them up before dashing away.

You hear a cry behind you - "You've soiled it!".
